ToMem
=====

Store files in memory with `memcached <https://memcached.org/>`_.

Uses a ledger to keep track of stored files informations such as name, size and
checksum to ensure data integrity.

.. warning:: This is a personal project and a very much a work in progress.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   cli
   api
